introduction: I’m passionate about software development and web design, and I started learning through online videos. I enjoy working with JavaScript, Angular, and Git because I like solving problems and growing professionally. I prefer teamwork since it helps me learn from others. My motivation comes from enjoying the learning process, creating my own projects, and building a career in IT.
locate: I’m based in Germany and enjoy working in flexible, modern setups. I’m open to remote work
motivate: I am open to new ideas and enthusiastic about learning modern technologies as well as continuously improving my skills.
solving: My problem-solving approach combines analytical thinking, creativity, and persistence. I learn from every challenge while collaborating with others to find the most effective solutions.
technologie-text: here a list of my technologie i used in my projects
Discovering frameworks: Discovering and mastering new frameworks and technologies truly excites me
portfolio-subheadline: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
join-info: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
pokedex-info: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
game-info: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer Chicken.
subheadline-desc-1: I’d love to connect and contribute as a Frontend Developer
subheadline-desc-2: bringing user-friendly and high-performance solutions to your projects.
